# archestra_profile_tool (Resource)

Assigns a tool to a profile (agent) in Archestra.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_profile_tool" "example" {
  profile_id = archestra_agent.example.id
  tool_id    = data.archestra_mcp_server_tool.example.id

  credential_source_mcp_server_id            = archestra_mcp_server.example.id
  execution_source_mcp_server_id             = archestra_mcp_server.example.id
  use_dynamic_team_credential                = false
  allow_usage_when_untrusted_data_is_present = false
  tool_result_treatment                      = "trusted"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `profile_id` (String) The profile (agent) ID to assign the tool to
- `tool_id` (String) The tool ID from the tool catalog to assign

### Optional

- `allow_usage_when_untrusted_data_is_present` (Boolean) Whether to allow tool usage when untrusted data is present in the context
- `credential_source_mcp_server_id` (String) MCP server ID to use for credentials
- `execution_source_mcp_server_id` (String) MCP server ID to use for execution
- `tool_result_treatment` (String) How to treat the tool result: trusted, untrusted, or sanitize_with_dual_llm
- `use_dynamic_team_credential` (Boolean) Whether to use dynamic team credentials

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal profile tool assignment identifier
